title: How to Unlock Super Sonic in Sonic Heroes

steps.headline: Enter the bonus stage in every possible level.
steps.description: Fulfill the certain conditions needed to enter the bonus stage in the first place. Try to do this for each tag team and every level in case you do not succeed in some bonus stages.

steps.headline: Once you have entered, play the mini-game that you are forced to do in the stage.
steps.description: This game is similar to that seen in Sonic the Hedgehog 2; you must run around a half-pipe for a limited time and attempt to get as much colored balls to get faster.

steps.headline: Beat the bonus stage to earn a Chaos Emerald.
steps.description: In order to beat the stages, you must earn enough boost from collecting the balls to do so. However, the time and spike bombs (as well as the slippery controls) hinder you from doing so.

steps.headline: After acquiring a Chaos Emerald, exit the bonus stage and get the other remaining ones.
steps.description: Repeat the same process above and do this for other bonus stages in other levels in order to collect the six remaining Emeralds.

steps.headline: With all 7 Chaos Emeralds collected, you will now unlock the Final Story.
steps.description: Enter this game mode to watch a very long cutscene of the Heroes discovering that (spoiler alert) Dr. Eggman was being manipulated by Metal Sonic the whole time, who has copied the data of Sonic, Shadow, Froggy, and Chao, causing him to transform into Neo Metal Sonic.

steps.headline: Sonic will ask the other members to find a solution and Dr. Eggman tells them that only the Chaos Emeralds can stop him.
steps.description: Each member takes out an Emerald, allowing Sonic to become Super Sonic and create an energy shield for Tails and Knuckles. You will now have to beat Neo Metal Sonic (who is now a cybernetic dragon beast) to save the day and to ultimately beat the game.

Try to do this for each tag team and every level in case you do not succeed in some bonus stages. Once you have entered, play the mini-game that you are forced to do in the stage. This game is similar to that seen in Sonic the Hedgehog 2; you must run around a half-pipe for a limited time and attempt to get as much colored balls to get faster. Beat the bonus stage to earn a Chaos Emerald. In order to beat the stages, you must earn enough boost from collecting the balls to do so. However, the time and spike bombs (as well as the slippery controls) hinder you from doing so. After acquiring a Chaos Emerald, exit the bonus stage and get the other remaining ones. Repeat the same process above and do this for other bonus stages in other levels in order to collect the six remaining Emeralds. With all 7 Chaos Emeralds collected, you will now unlock the Final Story. Enter this game mode to watch a very long cutscene of the Heroes discovering that (spoiler alert) Dr. Eggman was being manipulated by Metal Sonic the whole time, who has copied the data of Sonic, Shadow, Froggy, and Chao, causing him to transform into Neo Metal Sonic. Sonic will ask the other members to find a solution and Dr. Eggman tells them that only the Chaos Emeralds can stop him. Each member takes out an Emerald, allowing Sonic to become Super Sonic and create an energy shield for Tails and Knuckles. You will now have to beat Neo Metal Sonic (who is now a cybernetic dragon beast) to save the day and to ultimately beat the game.

Enter this game mode to watch a very long cutscene of the Heroes discovering that (spoiler alert) Dr. Eggman was being manipulated by Metal Sonic the whole time, who has copied the data of Sonic, Shadow, Froggy, and Chao, causing him to transform into Neo Metal Sonic.
